QuestData.Title: Elemental Fury
QuestData.Description:
The naga have angered the elements and disrupted the natural order. We must restore the balance before it is too late.
A Farseer maintains a deep connection with the elements. When the naga forces imprisoned my master, the natural balance was disturbed.
Take the Stone of Elements and use it to pacify the enraged water elementals throughout Dragon's Teeth Basin.
Ultimately, our only solution is to rescue Farseer Ori and bring him back alive, but the Tidestone could buy us precious time...
